member.name: D2D1_ATLAS_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Atlas effect.

member.name: D2D1_ATLAS_PROP.D2D1_ATLAS_PROP_INPUT_RECT
member.summary: The portion of the image passed to the next effect. Type is D2D1_VECTOR_4F. Default value is (-FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX).

member.name: D2D1_ATLAS_PROP.D2D1_ATLAS_PROP_INPUT_PADDING_RECT
member.summary: The maximum size sampled for the output rectangle. Type is D2D1_VECTOR_4F. Default value is (-FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX).
